headline.main: Europe; Beginning a New Chapter in American History

lead_paragraph: In response to a suggestion of Ambassador Winant, a short history of the United States is available for the first time in the secondary schools of Great Britain. This introduction to American history for British students is written by Professor Allan Nevins of Columbia, whose knowledge of the historic backgrounds of both countries is sufficient guarantee that the text possesses the balance and perspective so often lacking in the one-sided school compendium.
